ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ustssxp | |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ V e. U ) -> V C_ ( X X. X ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_xpss | |- ( X X. X ) C_ ( _V X. _V ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl6ss | |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ V e. U ) -> V C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-rel | |- ( Rel V <-> V C_ ( _V X. _V ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( U e. ( UnifOn ` X ) /\ V e. U ) -> Rel V ) |
